Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-12401 affecting package cert-manager for versions less than 1.12.15-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-12401 affecting package cert-manager for versions less than 1.12.15-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cert-manager is earlier than 1.12.15-1, affected by CVE-2024-12401
